name: A Christmas To Die For
description:
Join Detective Vixen in a snowy alleyway to investigate the mysterious death of... Santa?!

This quick, fun mystery can be played right here, right now on your computer. All you need is your typing fingers - or thumbs! - and a sprinkling of curiosity. It takes 10-30 minutes, depending on how thorough you are, and best of all it's completely FREE!

Just click the button below to be magically transported to the crime scene or read on for more info...

How do I play?

Type words or phrases into the box at the top of the screen to search the crime scene, uncover clues and find out what secrets are lurking in Santa's grotto... Investigate on your own or huddle around the keyboard with friends! 

Is it really free?

Yes! This is just a little Christmas fun to say thank you for all your support this year. It shouldn't take long to solve, as long as you pay attention to all the clues...

Well, what are you waiting for? This murder's not going to solve itself!
